v0.8.12       Fix dashes in Ollama prompt. Ollama now works well with Qwen3.

v0.8.10       Qt .ts support for local and Ollama. Fix local mem leak.
v0.8.9        Add initial support for Qt .ts files.
v0.8.8        Add tests. Fix minor bugs.
v0.8.7        Rebuild PO files, bump.
v0.8.6        Add Ollama and local translation engines. Better translations, fewer langs.
v0.8.5        Translate app to ~40 langs, add to Makefile. Update PDF builds.
v0.8.4        Rebuild, PO file formatting.
v0.8.3        Add Dotenv support. Split out build doc. Add LibreTranslate doc. Add examples.
v0.8.2        Fix PDF names. Notes on building releases. Translate new strings.
v0.8.1        PyPI links, Spanish translation updates, keywords.
v0.8.0        Set up for PyPI. Beta!
v0.7.1        Docs: add Install page. Split out development dependencies.
v0.7.0        Translate transpolibre documentation website with transpolibre into Spanish.
v0.6.5        Translate transpolibre code with transpolibre into Spanish. :)
v0.6.4        Add type hints. Keep existing translation unless overwrite used.
v0.6.3        Use logging for VERBOSE too.
v0.6.2        Set up strings for gettext translation. Use logging for DEBUG.
v0.6.1        It works! :)
v0.6.0        Setup website with Sphinx documentation.
